resources.string: 30 Days of Veg
Ingredients
Instructions
Vegetable Stir-Fry
Broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, snap peas, garlic, soy sauce, olive oil, sesame seeds.
Sauté vegetables in olive oil, add garlic, and stir in soy sauce. Garnish with sesame seeds.
Chickpea Salad
Chickpeas, cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, parsley, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, pepper.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl and serve chilled.
Paneer Tikka
Paneer, yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, cumin, coriander powder, garam masala, lemon juice.
Marinate paneer with spices and yogurt. Skewer and grill until golden.
Spinach and Mushroom Pasta
Pasta, spinach, mushrooms, garlic, cream, Parmesan cheese, olive oil, salt, pepper.
Sauté garlic and mushrooms, add spinach and cream. Toss with pasta and serve with Parmesan.
Stuffed Bell Peppers
Bell peppers, quinoa, black beans, corn, tomatoes, cheese, cumin, chili powder.
Stuff bell peppers with the quinoa mixture and bake until tender. Top with cheese.
Aloo Gobi (Potato and Cauliflower Curry)
Potatoes, cauliflower, tomatoes, onions, ginger, garlic, turmeric, cumin, coriander powder.
Sauté onions, ginger, garlic, and spices. Add potatoes and cauliflower, cook until tender.
Matar Paneer (Peas and Cottage Cheese Curry)
Paneer, green peas, tomatoes, onions, ginger, garlic, cumin, coriander, turmeric.
Sauté onions, garlic, ginger, add spices, tomatoes, peas, and paneer. Simmer until cooked.
Vegetable Biryani
Basmati rice, carrots, peas, green beans, tomatoes, onions, biryani masala, yogurt, saffron.
Cook rice with vegetables and spices, layer with saffron yogurt, and bake or cook on low heat.
Mixed Vegetable Pakoras
Besan (gram flour), potatoes, spinach, onions, coriander, cumin, salt, water, oil.
Mix vegetables in gram flour batter, deep fry until golden.
Palak Paneer (Spinach and Cottage Cheese Curry)
Spinach, paneer, onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, cumin, garam masala, cream.
Blanch spinach, sauté spices, and paneer, blend spinach, and cook until flavors combine.
Vegetable Pulao
Basmati rice, mixed vegetables (peas, carrots, beans), cumin, cloves, cinnamon, onions, garlic.
Sauté spices and onions, add vegetables and rice, cook until rice is fluffy.
Falafel
Chickpeas, onion, garlic, cumin, coriander, parsley, flour, baking powder, salt, oil.
Blend ingredients into a dough, form balls, and fry until golden brown.
Vegetable Tacos
Corn tortillas, black beans, bell peppers, onions, avocado, salsa, cheese, lettuce.
Sauté vegetables, warm tortillas, assemble tacos with veggies, beans, and toppings.
Lentil Soup
Red lentils, carrots, celery, onions, garlic, tomatoes, cumin, vegetable broth.
Sauté onions and garlic, add vegetables and lentils, simmer until lentils are tender.
Paneer Butter Masala
Paneer, butter, tomatoes, onions, cream, cashews, cumin, garam masala, chili powder.
Sauté onions, tomatoes, and spices, blend, add paneer and simmer in the creamy sauce.
Vegetable Spring Rolls
Cabbage, carrots, bell peppers, soy sauce, spring roll wrappers, oil.
Stir-fry vegetables, fill wrappers, roll, and fry until crispy.
Stuffed Mushrooms
Mushrooms, breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, garlic, parsley, olive oil.
Stuff mushrooms with seasoned breadcrumbs, bake until golden.
Zucchini Fritters
Zucchini, flour, egg, Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, salt, pepper, olive oil.
Mix ingredients, form fritters, and pan-fry until golden and crispy.
Vegetarian Sushi Rolls
Sushi rice, nori sheets, avocado, cucumber, carrots, soy sauce.
Prepare sushi rice, layer with veggies, roll tightly, and cut into slices.
Veggie Burger
Black beans, quinoa, onions, garlic, breadcrumbs, egg, spices, burger buns.
Mash beans with spices, form patties, grill, and serve in buns with toppings.
Vegetable Frittata
Eggs, spinach, tomatoes, onions, bell peppers, cheese, salt, pepper.
Sauté vegetables, pour in beaten eggs, and bake until set.
Gnocchi with Tomato Sauce
Gnocchi, tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, basil, Parmesan cheese.
Cook gnocchi, prepare tomato sauce, and combine before serving with cheese.
Chana Masala (Chickpea Curry)
Chickpeas, tomatoes, onions, ginger, garlic, cumin, coriander, garam masala.
Sauté onions and spices, add chickpeas, and simmer in a tomato-based sauce.
Vegetable Kebabs
Bell peppers, zucchini, mushrooms, onions, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, spices.
Marinate vegetables, skewer, and grill until tender.
Tofu Stir-Fry
Tofu, broccoli, bell peppers, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, sesame oil.
Stir-fry tofu and vegetables with garlic, ginger, and soy sauce.
Stuffed Zucchini Boats
Zucchini, quinoa, tomatoes, cheese, garlic, olive oil.
Hollow out zucchini, fill with quinoa mixture, and bake until tender.
Vegetable Samosas
Potatoes, peas, cumin, coriander, turmeric, flour, water, oil.
Prepare a dough, stuff with spiced potatoes and peas, and deep fry.
Minestrone Soup
Tomatoes, pasta, beans, zucchini, carrots, celery, onions, garlic, vegetable broth.
Sauté onions, add vegetables, broth, and pasta, simmer until cooked.
Bruschetta with Tomato and Basil
Baguette, tomatoes, garlic, basil, olive oil, salt, pepper.
Toast bread, top with seasoned tomato mixture.
Sweet Potato Curry
Sweet potatoes, coconut milk, tomatoes, onions, garlic, ginger, curry powder.
Sauté onions, garlic, and spices, add sweet potatoes and coconut milk, simmer until tender.
